The latest POLITICO scoops and coverage of the 2016 elections.

                AP Photo
10/13/15 01:31 PM EDT
LAS VEGAS — POLITICO's Gabriel Debenedetti caught up with Jennifer Palmieri, communications director for Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign, and asked her what she sees as the Democratic front-runner's opportunity in tonight's prime-time debate.
Here's what she said:
Just caught up with @HillaryClinton comms director @jmpalmieri. Here's what she says we can expect tonight. (1/2) pic.twitter.com/nl7B3y9bQL
— Gabriel Debenedetti (@gdebenedetti) October 13, 2015
More @jmpalmieri on @HillaryClinton's message and opportunity on the debate stage tonight (2/2): pic.twitter.com/OWEsa5BhsL
— Gabriel Debenedetti (@gdebenedetti) October 13, 2015
 © 2015 POLITICO LLC
description: LAS VEGAS - POLITICO's Gabriel Debenedetti caught up with Jennifer Palmieri, communications director for Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign, and asked her what she sees as the Democratic front-runner's opportunity in tonight's prime-time debate.
title: Clinton adviser spills on the front-runner's gameplan for tonight
